JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Do you want to join an exciting new industry and a great team? Then read below……
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Company

Valeos is a Medical Cannabis company currently licenced under the Danish medicine agency (DKMA) Pilot Program located in Holeby, Denmark. The company is currently nearing the end building phase of its 3000 square meter indoor growing facility. At which time Valeos will apply for its GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) Licence. The company is a Danish and English speaking, with English as its main language.

Valeos is just beginning to expand and is looking for excited new employees, who want to have lots of opportunities to move up in a new company.

Position

The Production Operator will report to his/her assigned supervisor for instruction on their production duties for each day. The operator will be trained to work towards achieving a high understanding of pruning, transplanting, cleaning, and trimming.

Job Duties

  • All tasks related to medical cannabis propagation, transplanting, pruning, harvesting, trimming, cleaning, and packaging.
  • Understand and follow production SOP’s. (Standard Operating Procedures).
  • Ensure the proper and accurate completion of all documents as they pertain to production.
  • Always cooperate with QA (Quality Assurance).
  • Ensure all security measures are always being followed.
  • Ensure all safety measure are always being followed.
  • Other duties as required.

Requirements

  • Completion of a High school education and/ or experience is preferred.
  • Understanding basic vocal/ written English is preferred
  • It is preferred but not mandatory to have experience in a greenhouse manufacturing environment or cannabis growing operation
  • Strong teamwork skills.
  • Ability to follow direction.
  • Ability to stay focused and complete redundant and routine tasks.
  • Good/ Positive Attitude

Working Conditions

  • Capable of lifting 20 kg. and ability to work in humid / warm greenhouse conditions.
  • Some Flexible working hours weekdays, weekends or afternoons depending on business schedule. Maybe required to stay later to complete daily tasks.
  • Applicants from Lolland-Falster are preferred.

Salary/ Compensation

  • Starting Salary is 155 Kr/h and after probation period of 3 months' pay is increased to 160 Kr/h

Valeos thanks all applicants for their interest; however, only those selected to continue in the recruitment process will be contacted. Please send CV/ resume to tc@valeos.dk

Valeos is committed to creating a diverse environment. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, colour, race, citizenship, ethnic origin, place of origin, creed, disability, family status, marital status (including single status), gender identity, gender expression, receipt of public assistance (in housing only), sex (including pregnancy and breastfeeding) or sexual orientation.
